effect.sword_shield: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.legends_arceus: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.

short_effect.sword_shield: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
